import React ,{useState} from 'react' import './post.css' import MoreVertIcon from '@mui/icons-material/MoreVert'; import {Users} from '../../dummyData' function Post({post}) { const [like,setLike]=useState(post.like) const [isLiked,setIsliked]=useState(false) const clickHandle=()=>{ setLike(isLiked ? like-1 : like+1) setIsliked } return (
u.id === post?.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt=""/> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === post?.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{like} likes
{post.comment} comments
) } export default Post
